overview: 1. Say Just Words 2. Hallowed Land 3. Blood Of Another 4. True Belief 5. Disappear 6. Lydia 7. Dying Freedom 8. Mercy 9. Shadow Kings 10. The Sufferer 11. Remembrance 12. Forever Failure 13. Soul Courageous 14. One Second 15. This Cold Life 16. Embers Fire 17. As I Die 18. The Last Time
title: Paradise Lost: One Second Live
